snippet: The idea that concerns about weight cross religious borders has led to a Muslim-Jewish dieting support group that also aims to foster tolerance and understanding.
abstract: Notion that concerns about weight cross religious borders has led to Muslim-Jewish dieting support group in Brookline, Mass, that also aims to foster tolerance and understanding; group Slim Peace brings Israeli and Palestinian women together for lessons and activities around healthy eating and self-esteem.
lead_paragraph: The idea that concerns about weight cross religious borders has led to a Muslim-Jewish dieting support group that also aims to foster tolerance and understanding.

headline.seo: Slim Peace Unites Jews and Muslims to Talk Diets
headline.main: Jewish and Muslim, Bonding Over Dieting
headline.print_headline: Jewish and Muslim, Bonding Over Dieting
